title: Deriving exact prepotential for $N = 2$ supersymmetric Yang-Mills theories from superconformal anomaly with rank two gauge groups
abstract: The exact prepotential for $N = 2$ supersymmetric Yang-Mills theory is derived from the superconformal anomalous Ward identity for the gauge group SU(2) and SU(3) which can be generalized to any other rank two gauge group.
